page.title: 03HOUSING / CREDENHILL AREA
page.content: THERE ARE FOUR MAIN ESTATES IN CREDENHILL: GLEBE CLOSE AND MEADOW DRIVE BUILT LATE 1960, ECROYD PARK LATE 1970S, WATERSIDE(A COUNCIL ESTATE), R.A.F. HOUSES FOR AIRMEN AND A SEPARATE ESTATE FOR OFFICERS. SOME BUNGALOWS AND COTTAGES ARE SCATTERED AROUND THE AREA. HILARY'S COTTAGE IN TILLINGTON IS 275 YEARS OLD. THERE IS A STUDY WHERE DAD WORKS, LOUNGE, DINING ROOM, KITCHEN,BATHROOM AND BEDROOMS. KAREN'S COTTAGE IS SET IN FIVE ACRES OF FARMLAND AND ORCHARD. RYAN'S HOUSE IS DETACHED WITH FOUR BEDROOMS. SOME LIVE IN SEMI_DETACHED AND TERRACED HOUSES. {8 _ OIL CENTRAL HEATING. {3 _ CALOR GAS HEATING. {6 _ SOLID FUEL HEATING R.A.F. AIRMEN_NO C/HEATING. ALL PARENTS EXCEPT 16 OWN THEIR HOUSES
